026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool;
027
028import java.util.EnumSet;
029
030import javax.tools.JavaFileObject;
031
032import com.sun.tools.javac.api.JavacTrees;
033import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.PackageSymbol;
034import com.sun.tools.javac.code.ClassFinder;
035import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Context;
036import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Context.Factory;
037
038/** Javadoc uses an extended class finder that records package.html entries
039 */
040public class JavadocClassFinder extends ClassFinder {
041
042    public static JavadocClassFinder instance(Context context) {
043        ClassFinder instance = context.get(classFinderKey);
044        if (instance == null)
045            instance = new JavadocClassFinder(context);
046        return (JavadocClassFinder) instance;
047    }
048
049    public static void preRegister(Context context) {
050        context.put(classFinderKey,
051            (Factory<ClassFinder>) JavadocClassFinder::new);
052    }
053
054    private ToolEnvironment toolEnv;
055    private EnumSet<JavaFileObject.Kind> all
056        = EnumSet.of(JavaFileObject.Kind.CLASS,
057            JavaFileObject.Kind.SOURCE,
058            JavaFileObject.Kind.HTML);
059    private EnumSet<JavaFileObject.Kind> noSource
060        = EnumSet.of(JavaFileObject.Kind.CLASS,
061            JavaFileObject.Kind.HTML);
062    private JavacTrees jctrees;
063
064    private final JavacTrees trees;
065
066    public JavadocClassFinder(Context context) {
067        super(context);
068        toolEnv = ToolEnvironment.instance(context);
069        preferSource = true;
070        trees = JavacTrees.instance(context);
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Override getPackageFileKinds to include search for package.html
075     */
076    @Override
077    protected EnumSet<JavaFileObject.Kind> getPackageFileKinds() {
078        return toolEnv.docClasses ? noSource : all;
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Override extraFileActions to check for package documentation
083     */
084    @Override
085    protected void extraFileActions(PackageSymbol pack, JavaFileObject fo) {
086        if (fo.isNameCompatible("package", JavaFileObject.Kind.HTML)) {
087            pack.sourcefile = fo;
088        }
089    }
090}
